card.text: Fanfare: Give all allied Portalcraft followers the following effect - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)

card.name: Marionette Lad
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.

card.name: Mia, Angelic Doll
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and put 2 Puppets into your hand. During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.

card.name: Prototype Warrior
card.text: Fanfare: Put 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck.

card.name: Shin, Lawful Light
card.text: Ward.

card.name: Cat Gunner
card.text: Rush. Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.

card.name: Licht, the Gearturner
card.text: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.

card.name: Vier, Doll Slayer
card.text: Bane. Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, if you have at least 2 play points, use 2 play points to transform it into a Doll Slayer. Last Words: Transform a random allied Doll Slayer into a Vier, Doll Slayer.

card.name: Doll Meister
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Put a Puppet into your hand and give it Bane.

card.name: Drill Hedgehog
card.text: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.

card.name: Mugnier, Purifying Light
card.text: Fanfare: Remove all effects on all other followers except changes to their attack or defense.

card.name: Begoggled Mole
card.text: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.

card.name: Phantom Blade Wielder
card.text: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.

card.name: Ameth, Dream Emissary
card.text: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ward. Then, if it's evolved, give it +1/+1, draw a card, and recover 1 play point.

card.name: Dimension Cut
card.text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If Resonance is active for you, deal 4 damage instead.

card.name: Rocket Knuckles
card.text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 6 damage instead.

card.name: Windup
card.text: Put a Puppet into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.

card.name: Artifact Call
card.text: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards instead.

card.name: Awakened Ragna
card.text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. Enhance (9): Choose - Put a Vesha, Herald of Ravage, Izalue, Herald of Death, or Jotet, Herald of Despair into your hand.
